messages.subject: ATTENTION All!
messages.msgSnippet: Our intrepid secretarytocaptthree has come up with a cool new layout for the website that I have undoubtedly screwed up terribly since it s off center on my
messages.messageBody:
Our intrepid secretarytocaptthree has come up with a cool new layout for
the website that I have undoubtedly screwed up terribly since it's off
center on my end since I use a different editing program *sigh* I
haven't converted all the pages since I don't want to chance ruining
them all at once :)
Anyway, mosey on over to http://www.shinsengumihq.com/

And let me know what you think and feel free to offer any and all
helpful hints and maybe an idea on where I can get Dreamweaver really
cheap...

--
Barbara Sheridan
http://www.barbarasheridan.net



[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
